name: Xiao Eating Snow
description: A wacky 2D minigame where our favorite pint-sized adeptus, Xiao, swaps his polearm for a snow-munching adventure! 🍧🌀 Dodge obstacles, collect snowflakes, and watch Xiao zip around the snowy landscape. But be warned, the more snow he devours, the faster he gets! It's a frosty frenzy with our airborne guardian - get ready for a giggly glide through the winter wonderland! ❄️
